item.description:
Hi All...

Hei La Moon has the best dim sum in the city!!! Sunday brunch in Chinatown has been a big and longstanding tradition that began in the 1920s. You'll see :0) And it's a wonderful experience and the dim sum delicious! The Best dim sun in Boston! Let's meet just inside Hei La Moon @ 1:00PM on Sunday March 22nd:

Hei La Moon
88 Beach St.
Boston, MA 02111
(617) 338-8813
Price: Reasonable

If you've never had dim sum give it a try :0) How else will you know if you like it? And, if you have and you like dim sum, you'll love it here!!

I hope to see you at Hei La Moon.

Cheers,
Michael
item.how_to_find_us: Reservation will be under Mike/Meet up

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Sunday Brunch in Chinatown - A Boston tradition since the 1920s
